nodes.text: Zor Vlahu was a Jedi who fought in the Ruusan campaign during the New Sith Wars. He had a sister named Myl Vlahu, and the two died in an assault on the Sith in 1000 BBY. Vlahu's lightsaber was claimed by a Sith and used in a later battle. The planet of Zor Vlahu in the Ruusan system was named after him.
